name: Blobs of Colour
description:
Blobs of Colour

A game about filling a hall with colour in 99 seconds while competing with 3 opponents. You're controlling an orbital laser directing three blobs to achieve this.

Made for #Minijam 62 (Theme: Colours, Limitation: All animations must use 2 frames).

How to play
  • Your slimes ("blobs") paint tiles they move over.
  • Fill as much of the floor with your colour as possible.
  • Having a square of four tiles filled with your colour doubles the score of those tiles. They will visibly connect.
  • Destroy your opponent's colour fileds by running over them.
Controls

Supported movement methods:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Mouse
  • Gamepad

Toggle fullscreen by pressing F11 or by hitting Select on your Gamepad.

Getting the game

You have the following options:

  • Get it right here on itch.io
  • Get it from the GitHub release page
  • Build it yourself using the source available at GitHub.

(Playing in browser works, but has some hiccups.
If you want the game to run flawlessly, please download the game.)
